t:property.name: message.content
t:property.value: Modify draft-add content and recipient from ZWC-content

t:property.name: message.subject1
t:property.value: Create draft with subject and content-subject

t:test_case.steps: 1. Login to admin account 2. Create a test_account1

t:test_case.t:objective: Create draft with subject in EWS and Sync on ZWC. Modify same draft using ZWC, add content and recipient and sync to EWS
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Create draft with subject in EWS and Sync on ZWC. 2. Modify same draft using ZWC, add content and recipient. 3. Sync on EWS for modified draft.

t:test_case.t:objective: Create draft with subject and content in EWS and sync on ZWC. Modify same draft using ZWC, Modify content and sync to EWS.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Create draft with subject and content in EWS and sync on ZWC. 2. Modify same draft using ZWC, Modify content 3. Sync on EWS for modified draft.
